author: tmiychao
content:
Hey <@&857649635274915900>! We created a template for project proposals to make it easier for you to submit them. Check it out here https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-three/blob/master/projects/project-template.md
Most of you already have at least a rough project idea, please start creating these project documents so we have it all in one place. If you have some draft, add it to agenda for Tuesday office hours call so you can get an initial feedback https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-three/issues/78
